translations: n．短途旅行，愉快的短途旅行：一种短暂的、愉快的旅行或活动。
· We went on a few weekend jaunts to the countryside.
我们去了几次周末的乡村短途旅行。
v．短途旅行，进行短途旅行：进行一次短暂的、愉快的旅行或活动。

sentences.sentence: Too often staff go on jaunts just because they like time out of the workplace.
sentences.translation: 在很多情况下，员工出差只是因为他们喜欢能有时间不在开办公室。

sentences.sentence: You can take your entire home on day-long deep-sea jaunts, then return to the jetty at night and power down.
sentences.translation: 你可以用它带上全家进行为期一天的深海旅游，晚上再回到码头关闭电源。

sentences.sentence: In song, the lazy months of beach trips and top-down country jaunts are supposed to be a golden time of the year for romance.
sentences.translation: 在歌中，在这悠闲的几个月里，人们往往去海滩或在乡间远足，本应是一年中谈恋爱的最佳季节。
